com.avos.avoscloud

类 AVRelation<T extends AVObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avos.avoscloud.AVRelation<T>

  • public class AVRelation<T extends AVObject>
extends java.lang.Object

    A class that is used to access all of the children of a many-to-many relationship. Each instance of AVOSCloud.Relation is associated with a particular parent object and key.

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public void add(T object)
        Adds an object to this relation.
        参数:
        object - The object to add to this relation.

      • addAll

        public void addAll(java.util.Collection<T> objects)
        Adds many parse objects to this relation.
        参数:
        objects - The objects to add to this relation.

      • remove

        public void remove(AVObject object)
        Removes an object from this relation.
        参数:
        object - The object to remove from this relation.

      • getQuery

        public AVQuery<T> getQuery()
        Gets a query that can be used to query the objects in this relation.
        返回:
        A AVQuery that restricts the results to objects in this relations.

      • getQuery

        public AVQuery<T> getQuery(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets a query that can be used to query the subclass objects in this relation.
        参数:
        clazz - The AVObject subclass.
        返回:
        A AVQuery that restricts the results to objects in this relations.

      • reverseQuery

        public static <M extends AVObject> AVQuery<M> reverseQuery(java.lang.String parentClassName,
                                           java.lang.String relationKey,
                                           AVObject child)
        Create a query that can be used to query the parent objects in this relation.
        参数:
        parentClassName - The parent class name
        relationKey - The relation field key in parent
        child - The child object.
        返回:
        A AVQuery that restricts the results to parent objects in this relations.

      • reverseQuery

        public static <M extends AVObject> AVQuery<M> reverseQuery(java.lang.Class<M> theParentClazz,
                                           java.lang.String relationKey,
                                           AVObject child)
        Create a query that can be used to query the parent objects in this relation.
        参数:
        theParentClazz - The parent subclass.
        relationKey - The relation field key in parent
        child - The child object.
        返回:
        A AVQuery that restricts the results to parent objects in this relations.
